data.text: @MrJoyner @Dorry_Segev @NPR @mgodoyh @npratc Aww, thank you so much for your thoughtful sentiments, Jeff!! They mean a lot! 💚 It is an honor to share my journey and help our amazing community. We’re in this together. So glad your health is well.

@ValensVoice @Dorry_Segev @NPR @mgodoyh @npratc @ValensVoice as a 2 time heart transplant recipient, this article and your voice are incredibly important. Thank you for your contributions on a national level! With love and life, Jeff.
